title: Sermon Planner
subtitle: Design your next preaching series with your AI Assistant's collaboration and your theological library.

planType.question: What type of plan do you want to create?
planType.thematicDescription: Based on a doctrinal or practical theme. The Assistant will search for verses and structure topics.
planType.expositoryDescription: Based on a biblical book. The Assistant will analyze the original text and suggest divisions.
